original_text: Like this, he went to the spirits who were in prison. He told them God's true message. Like this, he went to the spirits who were in prison. He told them God's true message.
korean_text: 그가 또한 영으로 가서 옥에 있는 영들에게 선포하시니라

sentences.original_text: to the spirits who were in prison
He told them God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 하나님의 참된 메시지를 전했습니다

sentences.original_text: to the spirits who were in prison
He told them God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에게 하나님의 참된 메시지를 전했습니다
